name: 10 TOW Ross' Grant Questions | 'Friends' Seasons and Episodes Trivia Quiz

questions.explanation:
Ross.

	Ross: "So, did he get on one knee, did he have a speech prepared, or  did he cry? Yeah, big surprise, I like proposals!"

questions.text: Who does Phoebe give her little black book to?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	Rachel: "Phoebe, isn't Jethro Tull a band?"   Phoebe: "Oh yes, they are."

questions.text: How much was Ross' grant for?
questions.explanation:
25,000 dollars.

	Ross: "And if I get it, I'll finally be able to complete my field research! And there will be an article about me in the "Paleontology Review"! Yeah! That'll be the first time my name is in there, without people raising serious questions about my work!"

questions.text: Charlie's ex-boyfriend was giving out Ross' grant.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ross: "So, your ex-boyfriend is gonna determine if your new boyfriend gets this grant?"

questions.text: Who does Phoebe first offer Gladys to?
questions.explanation:
Monica.

	Monica: "Well, of course I do. What's not to like! I'll take her in a minute! But, you know, I think that you're giving up too easy, honey. I think that you need to fight for her!"

questions.text: How late for work was Joey?
questions.explanation:
2 hours.

	Joey: "Oh, man, I'm two hours late for work!"

questions.text: Ross wanted to invite Chartlon Heston to his fantasy dinner party.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ross: "Do you think there's any chance he'll bring Christie Brinkley or C3PO?"

Greg Kinnear.

	Greg Kinnear and Aisha Tyler both hosted E! 'Talk Soup'.

questions.text: Did Chandler eventually watch Joey's tape?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Joey: "If you had seen what was on this tape, believe me, you would have some comments."

True.

	At seeing Charlie kiss Benjamin, Ross said, "Okay, that's it. We are seeing other people!"
